title: The service collects location information from your device

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
tosdr.tldr:
"location data from GPS-enabled devices (to the extent that you explicitly allowed it) provided by the devicesâ€™ interaction with the Games or association with your IP address. In addition, third parties may track and collect information regarding your online activities over time and across different online platforms (such as websites, applications, etc.)."

I recommend adding physical location case.
